mapper.select:
select a.supportno, a.email as myemail, a.projectno, b.address, nvl(b.postnum,'등록안됨') postnum, (select to_char(calculateduedate + 2,'YYYY-MM-dd') from project_funding d where a.PROJECTNO = d.projectno) as "deliveryduedate", (select projecttitle from project_outline e where a.projectno = e.projectno ) as "projecttitle", (select email from project_outline f where a.projectno = f.projectno) as "projectwriter", b.ITEMNAME, b.ITEMNUM, b.deliveryyn from support a join delivery b on a.supportno = b.supportno join project_deadline g on a.projectno = g.projectno where a.email = #{email}
and 1=1
and to_date(sysdate,'YYYY-MM-dd') - (select to_date(calculateduedate + 2,'YYYY-MM-dd') from project_funding h where a.PROJECTNO = h.projectno) < 0
and to_date(sysdate,'YYYY-MM-dd') - (select to_date(calculateduedate + 2,'YYYY-MM-dd') from project_funding i where a.PROJECTNO = i.projectno) >= 0
and g.SUCCESSYN = 'Y' and a.PAYYN='Y' order by deliveryduedate
mapper.update: update delivery set postnum = #{postNum}, address = #{address} where supportno = #{supportNo}
